text: Elsbeth Gerritsen (19 February 1971 – 21 December 2024) was a Dutch operatic mezzo-soprano. ==Biography== Gerritsen studied musicology at the Utrecht University and did afterwards singing education at the Amsterdam Conservatory. She was trained by and . Gerritsen was a solist with Asko/Schönberg, the Doelen Ensemble and Camerata Trajectina. She was a member of the Nederlandse Kamerkoor, Netherlands Bach Society, and the vocal quartet Quink. She sang in among others Orfeo in Orfeo ed Euridice, Martha in Faust, Mrs. Noye in Noye's Fludde, Miss Baggott in Brittens The Little Sweep, Miranda in The Tempest van Purcell, Boris Godoenov. and Peace in De Triomfeerende Min. In addition, she sang and performed in several world premieres. Gerritsen was married to bass- baritone Michiel Meijer. She died from breast cancer on 21 December 2024, at the age of 53. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Dutch singers Category:European opera singers Category:1971 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Elsbeth Gerritsen
